Package org.md2k.phonesensor.phone.sensors

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Accelerometer
    This class manages the accelerometer on the device.
    AccelerometerTest  
    AmbientLight
    This class manages the ambient light sensor on the device.
    AmbientTemperature
    This class manages the ambient temperature sensor on the device.
    Battery
    This class creates a battery sensor which gathers battery temperature, voltage, and charge percentage data.
    Compass
    This class manages the compass on the device.
    CPU
    This class creates a CPU sensor which gathers data about CPU usage from /proc/stat.
    Gyroscope
    This class manages the gyroscope sensor on the device.
    Memory
    This class creates a memory sensor which gathers memory use data.
    PhoneSensorDataSource
    This class handles the creation of PhoneSensorDataSource objects.
    PhoneSensorDataSources
    This class handles the ArrayList management for PhoneSensorDataSource
    Pressure
    This class manages the pressure sensor on the device.
    Proximity
    This class handles the proximity sensor.
    StepCount
    This class handles the pedometer sensor.
    TouchScreen
    This class handles the touchscreen interaction sensor.
